item.title: Getting Started with Azure DDoS Protection REST API: A Step-by-Step Guide
item.description: REST API is a cornerstone in the management of resources on Azure, providing a streamlined and efficient approach for executing create, read, update, and delete (CRUD) operations. By leveraging HTTP methods such as GET, POST, PUT, and DELETE, REST API simplifies resource manipulation for administrators. Moreover, REST API’s support for various data formats, including JSON and XML, enhances its versatility, making it indispensable for automating workflows and facilitating continuous deployment and integration practices. Focusing on Azure DDoS Protection, we will delve into its REST API integrat...
